lyrics.stanza: Let's enjoy Christ to reach the goal, Partake of Him to beat the foe, All His vast riches we extol, Yes, we are freed from every woe! We may not know a lot of things, But we are kept from Satan's stings By eating Christ, and Christ alone!

We all can do so many things, But first of all to Christ we'll cling; Enjoy Him, blessings then He'll bring, His life-supply means everything! Enjoy Him—grace He will bestow, And we'll be led to join the flow; Yes, we will do all things in Him.
